SELECT DISTINCT vo.organization_id as id, vo.organization_name as name, vo.organization_parent_id as parentId, vo.has_children as children, vo.full_path as fullPath FROM dict_dim_organization vo INNER JOIN dict_relation_role_organization ro on ro.organization_id = vo.organization_id and ro.customer_id = vo.customer_id INNER JOIN dict_dim_role r ON r.role_id = ro.role_id and ro.customer_id = r.customer_id INNER JOIN dict_relation_role_user ur ON ur.role_id = r.role_id and r.customer_id = ur.customer_id INNER JOIN dict_dim_user u ON u.user_id = ur.user_id and ur.customer_id = u.customer_id and u.is_lock = 0 LEFT JOIN dict_dim_organization_type dot ON dot.organization_type_id = vo.organization_type_id AND vo.customer_id=dot.customer_id WHERE vo.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY dot.organization_type_level, vo.depth

SELECT DISTINCT
emp.emp_id AS empId, emp.user_name AS userName, emp.user_name_ch AS userNameCh FROM dict_dim_organization vo INNER JOIN dict_relation_role_organization ro on vo.organization_id = ro.organization_id AND vo.customer_id=ro.customer_id INNER JOIN dict_dim_role dr on dr.role_id = ro.role_id AND vo.customer_id=dr.customer_id INNER JOIN dict_relation_role_user ur on ur.role_id = ro.role_id AND vo.customer_id=ur.customer_id INNER JOIN dict_dim_user du on ur.user_id = du.user_id and du.sys_deploy = 0 AND vo.customer_id=du.customer_id and du.is_lock = 0 inner JOIN v_dim_emp emp on emp.emp_id = du.emp_id AND vo.customer_id=emp.customer_id where vo.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND vo.customer_id=#{customerId}
